articles.title: Valimai box office collection Day 13: Ajith film enters profit zone in Tamil Nadu - India Today
articles.description: Ajith Kumar's Valimai entered the profit zone within two weeks of its release. Directed by H Vinoth, the action film is produced by Boney Kapoor.

articles.title: Bheemla Nayak box office collection Day 12: Pawan Kalyan film remains steady - India Today
articles.description: Pawan Kalyan and Rana Daggubati's Bheemla Nayak is likely to cross Rs 200 crore at the box office this weekend. The film was released in theatres on February 25.
